books.name: Clean Code: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship
books.description: A guide to writing clean, maintainable code that scales with teams and projects. Covers naming, functions, error handling, and formatting best practices.

books.description: Timeless advice on becoming a better programmer through practical techniques, automation, and pragmatic decision-making.
books.author: Andrew Hunt, David Thomas

books.name: Introduction to Algorithms
books.description: The definitive guide to algorithms covering sorting, searching, graph algorithms, dynamic programming, and computational geometry.

books.description: Deep dive into building reliable, scalable, and maintainable data systems covering storage, retrieval, replication, and partitioning.

books.name: Grokking Algorithms
books.description: Illustrated guide to algorithms using simple drawings and plain English, perfect for visual learners.

books.description: Fun, visual guide to design patterns using real-world examples and puzzles to make complex concepts accessible.
